name: perze-claude-code
description: Polyglot Claude Code plugin with 14 productivity commands and 11 specialized AI agents. Supports Python (FastAPI, pytest, ruff) and TypeScript (Next.js, React) stacks with automatic detection.
author: Perze

commands.name: new-task
commands.description: Analyze task complexity and create implementation plan

commands.description: Explain code with diagrams and examples (polyglot: py/ts)

commands.name: code-cleanup

commands.name: lint
commands.description: Run linting and fix issues (polyglot: ruff/eslint)
